verses.text:
Watch for the time is short; Watch while the trial to-day; Watch lest ye stand pre-test; Watch Christian, watch and pray;
Christ himself has the word, That comings not in haste; That if He is not prepared, For Christ's return, The harvest now is past;

chorus.text:
O watch and pray, O watch and pray; O watch in fast-ing, and watch in the day; Chris-tian, watch and pray;
O watch and pray, O watch and pray, O watch and pray, O watch and pray.
